### Loading Packages
```{r}
library(car)
library(ggplot2)
library(emmeans)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(tidyverse)
library(glmmTMB)
```

### Accessing Data
```{r}
getwd()
data1= read.csv(file="ShawnoHerb.csv")
```

### Data Wrangling
```{r}
data1= data1 %>%
  mutate(AMATU_Count= (AMATU_1 + AMATU_2)*2) #converted to 1m^2
```

# Waterhemp Efficacy 
```{r}
AMATU_EFF= glmmTMB(AMATU_EFF ~ Herb + (1|Rep), data= data1)

Anova.glmmTMB(AMATU_EFF)

Anova(AMATU_EFF)
```

# Waterhemp Counts
```{r}
AMATU_Count= lmer(AMATU_Count ~ Herb + (1|Rep), data= data1)

qqnorm(resid(AMATU_Count))
plot(AMATU_Count)
```
